overview: In Trelinski's timeless production he leads a superb, first-class young cast headed by Artur Ruzinski as Onegin and Kristīne Opolais as Tatyana. Mariusz Trelinski, Polish filmmaker and theater director, has created a series of dream-like, surrealist tableaux of great suggestive beauty.

production_companies.name: Palau de les Arts Reina Sofia

tagline: Tchaikovsky’s most beloved opera Eugene Onegin
title: Eugene Onegin
